name: Ali's Kebab House
details: Tender lamb kebabs with a smoky chargrilled flavor. Great portion size and served with fluffy rice.

name: Istanbul Grill
details: Delicious chicken doner with fresh vegetables and garlic sauce. The wrap was a bit soggy.

name: Kebab King
details: Beef kebabs were flavorful but slightly overcooked. The hot sauce was fantastic!

name: Sultan's Delight
details: Authentic Turkish Adana kebab, spicy and juicy. Great ambiance and fast service.

name: Meat & Fire
details: Mixed kebab platter with lamb, chicken, and kofte. Amazing flavor, slightly pricey though.
